title: RANK MODE POINT
body:
hey GM i think some mistake in RANK MODE

but if i lose i just lost 25 .
what is this GM ?? it not Equal

{{champion:86}}

replies.body:
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/League_system
"If you have higher MMR than a set amount for your division you gain more LP per won game and lose less LP per lost game, if your MMR is lower you gain less and lose more LP per game. "
Your loss and gains of LP are that way because your MMR is not reflective of your position. In order to raise your MMR, you will need to be winning more games than you are losing. Basically, your placement is not reflective of your skill level.
